sentences.sentence: Mr Cai believes China has already reached this “Lewisian turning-point” and that its arrival can be seen in more assertive workers and wage rises.
sentences.translation: 蔡先生认为，中国已经达到了这个“刘易斯转折点”，它的到来可以见证于更自信工人和工资上升方面。

sentences.sentence: Mr Cai believes China has already reached this "Lewisian turning-point" and that its arrival can be seen in more assertive workers and wage rises.
